full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' STOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHA CIG 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA CIG BYA BA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG SNYING MA RNED PA DANG, @005A *, ,SDE MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIMS 'GROR, DGOS CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I DANG PO MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA 'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAMS PA SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RTUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI SANGS RGYAS RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
